td.content: s:patient presents with Kidney. he is having symptoms 4 x week, in spite of treatment. he is a 20 yr old M harpist. o:Height 70 in, Weight 153 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 13, Basic Metabolic Panel Creatinine=1.9 mg/dL,BUN=35 mg/dl,glucose=80 mg/dL,calcium=8 mg/dL, Sodium, Urine Sodium, Urine=43 meq/L, FENa FENa=2 % a:Acute Renal Failure p:administered Isotonic Saline (0.9%) - 200 cc/gr bolus, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Sodium, Urine, FENa, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:patient presents w/ c/o 6 days h/o Kidney. pt is a male aged 21 ys. o:Height 71 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:pt indicates Kidney. he is a white M aged 21 ys. o:Height 71 in, Weight 157 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed AVAPRO - 150 mg by mouth daily.
